oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Manner of carrying a young baby in use among Bushman women. Partly in Bushman by and partly in English after /han=kasso (L VIII.27. 8406 rev., note). 1) This story is found in Book VIII-27.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: How children are carried
